title: HR Management Practical Competency Strengthening: Financial Accounting Comprehension Course Using Integrated Graphical Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Interpret financial data in graph-text integrated formats and accurately explain relationships between financial statements with over 80% accuracy
Apply financial ratio analysis results to three or more practical cases using integrated graph-text materials
Create a report combining complex accounting information with visualized materials and achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) from peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
